headline: Can Micron’s 131% Rally Continue Amid AI Momentum and Soaring Memory Demand?
summary: If you are wondering what to do with shares of Micron Technology right now, you are far from alone. The company has been on the radar of investors everywhere, thanks to some jaw-dropping moves in its stock price. Over the past week alone, Micron jumped 8.1%. Zoom out to the last month, and it’s up a remarkable 24.3%. Year-to-date, the share price has skyrocketed 131.6%, which is not a typo, and even over the past year, it has delivered a stunning 88.4% return. Long-term holders have been...
